name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D】生演奏！？楽しんだもん勝ちのBANDLIVE！【#常闇トワ1周年記念】 [TjhOZn1vNW4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Hoshimachi Suisei performing 'Shunkan Sentimental' on stage.
MC segment where Towa and Suisei talk about their collaboration history and muscle pain from practicing.

subtitles.original: ...奪い去る
subtitles.english: ...take it away

subtitles.original: 欲しがっていたものを手にしても
subtitles.english: Even if I get what I've been wanting

subtitles.original: 素直にうまく笑えないのはなぜだろう
subtitles.english: Why can't I just smile honestly?

subtitles.original: 溢れる涙は弱さや後悔じゃない
subtitles.english: The overflowing tears aren't from weakness or regret

subtitles.original: 痛みが産んだカケラで
subtitles.english: They're fragments born from pain

subtitles.original: どんな瞬間だって運命だって
subtitles.english: No matter the moment, no matter the fate

subtitles.original: ひとつだけ確かなものがあると知った
subtitles.english: I've learned that there's one thing I can be sure of

subtitles.original: ひとりで考えちゃって今を迷うより
subtitles.english: Rather than being lost in the present, thinking alone

subtitles.original: 明日を迎えに行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'm going to go out and meet tomorrow

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ずっと持ってたい心は地雷
subtitles.english: The heart I want to keep forever is a landmine

subtitles.original: スイッチは切ってない
subtitles.english: The switch isn't turned off

subtitles.original: 変わらない未来壊したい
subtitles.english: I want to destroy the unchanging future

subtitles.original: いつも僕を見てるありふれたメロディが
subtitles.english: The common melody that's always watching me

subtitles.original: くだらないと人に笑われても
subtitles.english: Even if people laugh and call it worthless

subtitles.original: キラリなおさら輝くのはなぜだろう
subtitles.english: Why does it sparkle and shine even more?

subtitles.original: 何が本当で嘘か理屈じゃなくて
subtitles.english: It's not about logic, what's real or what's a lie

subtitles.original: 感じていたい心で
subtitles.english: I want to feel it with my heart

subtitles.original: きっと熱くなって現状だって
subtitles.english: It'll surely get heated, even this current situation

subtitles.original: ごまかしたくないよ傷ついたとしても
subtitles.english: I don't want to fake it, even if I get hurt

subtitles.original: わかり合いたいと強く願うほど
subtitles.english: The more I strongly wish for us to understand each other

subtitles.original: ぶつかることもあるから
subtitles.english: The more we might clash

subtitles.original: 感じて！
subtitles.english: Feel it!

subtitles.original: もっといけるぞ！
subtitles.english: We can do more!

subtitles.original: どんな瞬間だって運命だって
subtitles.english: No matter the moment, no matter the fate

subtitles.original: ひとつだけ確かなものがあると知った
subtitles.english: I've learned that there's one thing I can be sure of

subtitles.original: 限界だって困難だって
subtitles.english: Even if there are limits, even if there are difficulties

subtitles.original: あきらめたくないよこのまま離さないで
subtitles.english: I don't want to give up, don't let go of me like this

subtitles.original: 固く握りしめた君の右手のぬくもり
subtitles.english: The warmth of your right hand that I held tight

subtitles.original: ここにあるから
subtitles.english: It's right here

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 2曲目はトワの大事な、じゃなくて...
subtitles.english: The second song is Towa's precious, I mean...

subtitles.original: 大好き、大好き、大好き、大好き、大好き、大好き...
subtitles.english: I love her, love her, love her, love her...

subtitles.original: 違うって言ってもあれなんだけど
subtitles.english: Even if I say it's different, it's...

subtitles.original: 大好きな、すごい尊敬してるすいちゃんが来てくれました！
subtitles.english: My favorite, whom I highly respect, Sui-chan is here!

subtitles.original: わー！ありがと呼んでくれて！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thanks for inviting me!

subtitles.original: 彗星のごとく現れたスターの原石！アイドルVTuberの星街すいせいでーす！
subtitles.english: A diamond in the rough who appeared like a comet! I'm the idol VTuber, Hoshimachi Suisei!

subtitles.original: いえーい！えー、ちょっとお水飲んじゃおうかな？
subtitles.english: Yay! Er, I think I'll have some water.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあすいちゃんも飲んじゃおうかな。
subtitles.english: Oh, then I'll have some too.

subtitles.original: 二人で一緒に飲むと無言になるっていうね。
subtitles.english: They say when two people drink together, they fall silent.

subtitles.original: 二人で一緒に飲んだら、二倍味が美味しくなるっていう...
subtitles.english: But they also say when two people drink together, it tastes twice as good...

subtitles.original: そうでもない。
subtitles.english: Not really.

subtitles.original: はい！トワの、すいちゃんのなんか、50万人記念の枠で初めてデュエットして
subtitles.english: Yes! On Suisei's 500k subscribers stream, we duetted for the first time...

subtitles.original: プラトニック・ガールをやって...
subtitles.english: We performed "Platonic Girl"...

subtitles.original: きた！うん。
subtitles.english: It's here! Yeah.

subtitles.original: でも、トワの配信では一回もコラボしたことなかったんですよ！
subtitles.english: But we've never collaborated on Towa's channel before!

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ、実はね！実は！実は！
subtitles.english: That's right, actually! Actually! Actually!

subtitles.original: だから今日はこうやって来てくれて一緒に歌えたことがとってもハッピー！
subtitles.english: So I'm very happy that you could come and sing with me today!

subtitles.original: 私も嬉しい、私も嬉しい。
subtitles.english: I'm happy too, I'm happy too.

subtitles.original: ちょうど最近もね、トワがギターやって、私がベースやって...
subtitles.english: Just recently, Towa played guitar and I played bass...

subtitles.original: これだったよねトワ、トワこれだったよね。
subtitles.english: It was like this, right Towa? You were like this.

subtitles.original: こうやって、うおぉー！って。
subtitles.english: Like this, "Whoooa!"

subtitles.original: 次の日めちゃめちゃ筋肉痛になったからね！
subtitles.english: My muscles were so sore the next day!

subtitles.original: そう言ってた、筋肉痛になったって言ってた。
subtitles.english: You did say that, that you got muscle pain.

subtitles.original: トワのこの美脚が、筋肉痛！
subtitles.english: Towa's beautiful legs were sore!

subtitles.original: あれも楽しかったし、今日もすごい楽しかった、一緒に歌えて。
subtitles.english: That was fun, and today was really fun too, being able to sing together.

subtitles.original: え、でも、あと一曲一緒に歌ってくれますか？
subtitles.english: But, will you sing one more song with me?

subtitles.original: 仕方ないなー。
subtitles.english: I guess I have no choice.

subtitles.original: え、仕方ない？じゃあいいよ、じゃあ。
subtitles.english: Eh, no choice? Fine then.

subtitles.original: あ、ごめん、なんでもない、違う！
subtitles.english: Ah, sorry, never mind, no!

subtitles.original: 歌わせてください、お願いします！歌わせてください！
subtitles.english: Please let me sing, please! Let me sing!
